featured.text: One reason the earthquake caused such damage was that Bam's buildings were made mostly from baked mud.
The use of baked mud for buildings explains ____________.

definition.zh_def: 經過烘烤的，通常指食物在高溫下加熱以使其熟透或變脆。
definition.en_def: Cooked by dry heat in an oven.
definition.example: She baked a delicious chocolate cake for the party.
